# The `DieRangeInfo` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A class that keeps the address range information for a single <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a>. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfverifier-h/#l00090">90</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfverifier-h">DWARFVerifier.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfverifier-cpp/#l00093">93</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfverifier-cpp">DWARFVerifier.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### insert() {#ae02fcde8a02b1b7a549f029f6c845863}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::optional&lt; DWARFAddressRange &gt; DWARFVerifier::DieRangeInfo::insert (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dwarfaddressrange">DWARFAddressRange</a> &amp; R)</>}>
Inserts the address range.

If the range overlaps with an existing range, the range that it overlaps with will be returned and the two address ranges will be unioned together in &quot;Ranges&quot;. If a duplicate entry is attempted to be added, the duplicate range will not actually be added and the returned iterator will point to end().

This is used for finding overlapping ranges in the DW&#95;AT&#95;ranges attribute of a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a>. It is also used as a set of address ranges that children address ranges must all be contained in.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfverifier-h/#l00078">78</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfverifier-h">DWARFVerifier.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfverifier-cpp/#l00051">51</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfverifier-cpp">DWARFVerifier.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### insert() {#a0b02158aa529c25804ce469f24cc8a67}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>DWARFVerifier::DieRangeInfo::die&#95;range&#95;info&#95;iterator DWARFVerifier::DieRangeInfo::insert (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dwarfverifier/dierangeinfo">DieRangeInfo</a> &amp; RI)</>}>
Inserts the address range info.

If any of its ranges overlaps with a range in an existing range info, the range info is <em>not</em> added and an iterator to the overlapping range info. If a duplicate entry is attempted to be added, the duplicate range will not actually be added and the returned iterator will point to end().

This is used for finding overlapping children of the same <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a>.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfverifier-h/#l00087">87</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfverifier-h">DWARFVerifier.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfverifier-cpp/#l00078">78</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfverifier-cpp">DWARFVerifier.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### intersects() {#a8d87dc2633ddd5ad9d65a824c13807c1}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool DWARFVerifier::DieRangeInfo::intersects (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dwarfverifier/dierangeinfo">DieRangeInfo</a> &amp; RHS) const</>}>
Return true if any range in this object intersects with any range in RHS.

Identical ranges are not considered to be intersecting.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfverifier-h/#l00094">94</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfverifier-h">DWARFVerifier.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfverifier-cpp/#l00117">117</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfverifier-cpp">DWARFVerifier.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
